title: "Instacart Dashboard"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    vertical_layout: scroll
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

data("instacart")
set.seed(1000)
instacart_df <- sample_n(instacart, 1000)
```

Column {data-width=550}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Distribution of the Hour of the Day Order is Placed by Department

```{r chart A}
x <- list(
  title = "<br><br><br>Department"
)
y <- list(
  title = "Order Hour of the Day"
)

instacart_df %>%
  mutate(department = fct_reorder(department, order_hour_of_day)) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~order_hour_of_day, color = ~department, type = "box", colors = "viridis") %>%
  layout(xaxis = x, yaxis = y)
```

Column {data-width=550}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Number of Items Ordered in Each Department

```{r Chart B}
x <- list(
  title = "<br><br><br><br>Department"
)
y <- list(
  title = "Count"
)

instacart_df %>% 
  count(department) %>% 
  mutate(department = fct_reorder(department, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~department, y = ~n, color = ~department, type = "bar", colors = "viridis") %>%
  layout(xaxis = x, yaxis = y)
```
